word: das Abkühlen, die There is no plural form for "das abkühlen" as it is an uncountable noun.
definition: To reduce the temperature of something, typically by removing heat or making it cooler. It is commonly used when referring to the process of cooling down a liquid, object, or environment.

examples.german: Das Essen muss abkühlen, bevor wir es essen können.
examples.english: The food needs to cool down before we can eat it.

examples.german: Ich habe mich im Pool abgekühlt.
examples.english: I cooled down in the pool.

examples.german: Die Getränke wurden im Kühlschrank abgekühlt.
examples.english: The drinks were cooled in the refrigerator.
The temperature will gradually cool down.

examples.german: Er benutzte einen Ventilator, um sich abzukühlen.
examples.english: He used a fan to cool down.
